item.title: 邮政银行结算后德意志银行股价上涨
item.description: 德意志银行周四股价上涨超过 2%，因为这家德国银行与半数以上指控其在 2010 年收购邮政银行时支付过少的原告达成了和解。【原文：Deutsche Bank shares rose more than 2% on Thursday after the German lender's settlements with more than half the plaintiffs who accused it of underpaying them in its takeover of Postbank in 2010.】

item.title: 沃尔沃赢得 DSV 300 辆电动卡车订单
item.description: 瑞典 AB 沃尔沃公司周四表示，已收到丹麦物流公司 DSV 300 辆电动卡车的订单。【原文：Sweden's AB Volvo said on Thursday it had received an order for 300 electric trucks from Danish logistics firm DSV .】

item.title: 德国 8 月份商业活动收缩，PMI 显示
item.description: 周四的一项初步调查显示，德国 8 月份的商业活动连续第二个月出现萎缩，且萎缩幅度超出预期。【原文：German business activity contracted in August for a second consecutive month and by more than expected, a preliminary survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普的焦虑刺激了对欧洲防务初创企业的投资
item.description: 据八位业内知名高管和投资者称，唐纳德-特朗普可能重返白宫有助于刺激欧洲各国对国防科技初创企业的投资热潮。【原文：Donald Trump's potential White House return has helped spur a flurry of investment in defence-technology startups across Europe, according to eight prominent industry executives and investors.】

item.title: 孟加拉国央行行长告诉 BBC，孟加拉国将在未来几天内将利率上调至 9%，以抑制通货膨胀
item.description: 孟加拉央行行长在周四早些时候发表的一篇采访中告诉英国广播公司（BBC），孟加拉央行将在未来几天内把利率从 8.5% 提高到 9%，以抑制飙升的通货膨胀。【原文：Bangladesh's central bank will raise interest rates to 9% from 8.5% in the coming days in a bid to tame soaring inflation, the bank's governor told the BBC in an interview published early on Thursday.】

item.title: 外国投资者回流，马来西亚大放异彩，同行则步履蹒跚
item.description: 马来西亚正迅速成为东南亚的避风港，外国投资者正重返这个长期被忽视的市场，因为增长改善、政府稳定和货币升值等因素使其在政治动荡的同行中脱颖而出。【原文：Malaysia is fast becoming a haven in Southeast Asia and foreign investors are returning to a long-overlooked market as a confluence of improving growth, stable government and rising currency sets it apart among peers grappling with political flux.】

item.title: 欧洲 开始出现降息迹象
item.description: Tom Westbrook 展望欧洲和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Tom Westbrook】

item.title: 加拿大国家铁路公司和加拿大太平洋铁路公司解雇了车队工会工人
item.description: 卡车司机工会周四表示，加拿大最大的两家铁路公司已将其加拿大工人拒之门外，这是史无前例的铁路停运事件，可能对经济造成严重损害。【原文：The Teamsters union said on Thursday that Canada's two largest rail companies had locked out their Canadian workers, an unprecedented rail stoppage that could badly damage the economy.】

item.title: 对中国对欧盟进口乳制品进行反补贴调查的反应
item.description: 中国对从欧盟进口的乳制品发起了反补贴调查，而就在欧盟对这个亚洲巨人制造的电动汽车修订关税计划的前一天。【原文：China launched an anti-subsidy investigation into dairy imports from the European Union a day after the bloc's revised tariff plan for electric vehicles made in the Asian giant.】

item.title: 美国运输安全委员会对加州特斯拉车祸展开调查
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会周三晚些时候表示，该机构已开始调查一辆特斯拉电动半挂卡车在加州高速公路上发生的车祸和起火事件。【原文：The U.S. National Transportation Safety Board has opened an investigation into a crash and fire involving a Tesla electric semi-truck on a California highway, the agency said late Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国恒大子公司交易为境外债权人带来前景
item.description: 专家表示，如果中国恒大的境外债权人能够证明该房地产开发商应从其境内子公司获得资金，他们就有可能增加收回资金的机会。【原文：Offshore creditors of China Evergrande might be able to increase their chance of recovering funds if they can prove the property developer is due money from onshore subsidiaries, to which they would therefore be entitled, experts said.】

item.title: 美联储准备降息，股市走高，美元受挫
item.description: 周四，由于美联储会议纪要显示决策者准备开始削减美国利率，亚洲股市走高，美元兑英镑和欧元则跌至一年低点。【原文：Asian shares inched higher while the dollar was pinned to one-year lows on sterling and the euro on Thursday as Federal Reserve minutes showed policymakers were ready to start cutting U.S. interest rates.】

item.title: 韩国在房地产问题上维持利率不变
item.description: 韩国央行周四连续第 13 次会议维持利率不变，因为即使今年晚些时候降息的可能性增大，决策者仍将控制顽固的通胀作为优先事项。【原文：South Korea's central bank kept interest rates unchanged for a 13th straight meeting on Thursday, as policymakers prioritised the need to keep stubborn inflation in check even as the case for rate cuts later this year grows.】

item.title: 韩国央行一如预期维持利率不变
item.description: 韩国央行周四连续第 13 次会议维持利率不变，因为即使今年晚些时候降息的可能性增大，决策者仍将控制顽固的通胀作为优先事项。【原文：South Korea's central bank kept interest rates unchanged for a 13th straight meeting on Thursday, as policymakers prioritised the need to keep stubborn inflation in check even as the case for rate cuts later this year grows.】

item.title: 杰克逊霍尔会议前美联储鸽派基调加深美元跌势
item.description: 周四，美元兑欧元和英镑的汇率接近一年多来的最低点，原因是美联储的鸽派态度和美国就业市场疲软的新迹象支持了降息。【原文：The dollar traded near the lowest in more than a year against the euro and sterling on Thursday as a dovish Federal Reserve and fresh signs of weakness in the U.S. job market backed the case for interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 美联储降息预期升温，油价抛售放缓
item.description: 在对美联储降息的预期抵消了世界两大经济体美国和中国一系列疲软的经济数据之后，原油的大幅抛售在周四暂停。【原文：A sharp sell-off in crude oil paused on Thursday after expectations of a rate cut by the Federal Reserve offset a bunch of weak economic data from the world's two largest economies, the United States and China.】

item.title: 日本制造业采购经理人指数（PMI）显示，日本 8 月工厂活动降幅放缓
item.description: 周四的一项商业调查显示，日本 8 月份的工厂活动在需求低迷的情况下出现萎缩，但萎缩速度有所放缓，而服务业则有所扩张，显示出一些行业的状况良好。【原文：Japan's factory activity shrank in August amid subdued demand although the pace of decline slowed, while the service sector expanded, showing upbeat conditions in some industries, a business survey showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于房地产交付放缓，中国凯撒预计上半年净亏损将扩大
item.description: 中国房地产开发商凯撒集团（Kaisa Group）周四表示，受房地产交付量下降和项目减值拨备增加的影响，预计今年上半年将出现更大的净亏损。【原文：Chinese property developer Kaisa Group said on Thursday it expects to report a bigger net loss for the first half of the year, hurt by a decline in property deliveries and higher impairment provisions set aside for projects.】

item.title: Wolfspeed 预计因制造问题第一季度收入疲软
item.description: Wolfspeed 周三预测第一季度营收低于预期，预计在电动汽车销售放缓的情况下，制造问题可能会影响其生产能力。【原文：Wolfspeed forecast first-quarter revenue below estimates on Wednesday, anticipating manufacturing issues that could affect its production capacity amid slowing EV sales.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，布朗夫曼将收购国家娱乐公司和派拉蒙股份的出价提高至 60 亿美元
item.description: 周三，熟悉内情的人士告诉《华尔街日报》，资深媒体高管小埃德加-布朗夫曼（Edgar Bronfman Jr）将收购国民娱乐公司（National Amusements）和派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）少数股权的出价提高到 60 亿美元。【原文：Veteran media executive Edgar Bronfman Jr sweetened his offer to $6 billion for National Amusements and a minority stake in Paramount Global , people familiar with the matter told the Wall Street Journal on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间交易韩国央行受到关注，美国收益率下滑
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 华特迪士尼委派董事会成员戈尔曼领导首席执行官人选小组
item.description: 华特迪士尼周三表示，已任命董事会成员、摩根士丹利执行董事长詹姆斯-戈尔曼（James Gorman）担任继任计划委员会主席，该委员会正在寻找下一任首席执行官。【原文：Walt Disney said on Wednesday it has named board member and Morgan Stanley's executive chairman James Gorman to chair its succession planning committee, which is looking for the next chief executive officer.】

item.title: Viva Aerobus 老板称政治因素阻碍了与 Allegiant 的合作
item.description: 墨西哥航空公司 Viva Aerobus 首席执行官周三表示，墨西哥航空公司 Viva Aerobus 认为，美国政府暂停审查与总部位于内华达州的 Allegiant Air 合作的提议是出于政治考虑，而非技术原因。【原文：Mexican airline Viva Aerobus believes the U.S. government's pause on reviewing a proposed tie-up with Nevada-based Allegiant Air is political rather than technical, the Mexican carrier's chief executive said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 道明银行表示将继续努力解决反洗钱调查问题
item.description: 加拿大道明银行集团周三表示，将继续积极寻求在全球范围内解决美国监管机构对其反洗钱计划的民事和刑事调查。【原文：Canada's TD Bank Group said on Wednesday it continues to actively pursue a global resolution of the civil and criminal investigations into its anti-money laundering program by the U.S. regulators.】

item.title: 微软下调第一季度智能云收入预期
item.description: 微软周三在投资者推介会上表示，该科技巨头下调了第一季度智能云预测。【原文：Microsoft on Wednesday cut its first-quarter intelligent cloud forecast, the technology giant said in an investor presentation.】

item.title: 在美国证券交易委员会提出质疑后，花旗银行在季度报告中增加了有关重组的新内容
item.description: 花旗集团在 8 月份向美国证券交易委员会提交的季度报告中增加了一个有关其多年重组的新章节，这是在市场监管机构提出质疑之后做出的决定。【原文：Citigroup's addition of a new section concerning its multi-year reorganization to its quarterly report filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission in August, followed queries from the markets regulator.】

item.title: 德意志银行就收购邮政银行诉讼达成和解
item.description: 德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）表示，该行最大的个人原告已同意和解，该原告起诉德意志银行少付了收购邮政银行的费用。【原文：Deutsche Bank said its largest individual plaintiff who sued the lender for underpaying them for the acquisition of Postbank has agreed to settle.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：普华永道因恒大审计案在华遭禁6个月
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，普华永道中国已通知其客户，预计最早将于 9 月被中国当局禁止开展业务六个月，作为对其审计倒闭房地产开发商恒大的惩罚的一部分。【原文：PwC China has informed its clients that it expects a six-month business ban by Chinese authorities as early as September as part of punishment over its audit of collapsed property developer Evergrande , the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: Zoom 上调年度收入预期
item.description: Zoom Video Communications 周三上调了年度营收预期，原因是在混合工作模式中部署的人工智能协作工具需求强劲，使其股价在延时交易中上涨了 4%。【原文：Zoom Video Communications raised its annual revenue forecast on Wednesday, driven by strong demand for its AI-powered collaboration tools deployed in hybrid work models, sending its shares up 4% in extended trading.】

item.title: 马斯克在 X 公司禁止远程工作的禁令暂时战胜了残疾偏见索赔
item.description: 加利福尼亚州一名联邦法官周三驳回了一起指控社交媒体平台 X 在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）接管该公司并禁止员工远程工作后强迫残疾员工离职的诉讼。【原文：A federal judge in California on Wednesday dismissed a lawsuit accusing social media platform X of forcing out workers with disabilities after Elon Musk took over the company and barred employees from working remotely.】
